data.text: Any Long-Term Experience with the WTB Byway Tires?

Can anyone provide long term experience with the WTB Byway tire? How does it hold up? I like the concept for riding pavement and a mixture of gravel and occasional single track. 40ish mm wide, faster rolling center strip and some tread on the sides.

I have a set of the 700x34s set up tubeless, I tend to run them on the higher side of ther spec'd pressure and mostly on pavement, occasionally onto hardpack singletrack. No complaints. Also Check the specialized Pathfinder.
data.author: Braden Graham
